member.name: T:Sander.SequentialGuid.GuidHelper
member.summary: Useful extension and helper methods for GUID

member.name: M:Sander.SequentialGuid.GuidHelper.FromBigInteger(System.Numerics.BigInteger)
member.summary:
Get GUID from BigInteger.
Note that it is possible for BigInteger not to fit to GUID

member.name: M:Sander.SequentialGuid.GuidHelper.AsLongs(System.Guid)
member.summary: Convert GUID to pair of longs

member.name: M:Sander.SequentialGuid.GuidHelper.GetCharacterAt(System.Guid,System.Int32)
member.summary:
Get character at the specified position (0..32). Character is returned in lowercase
Far faster and user less memory than using guid-to-string

member.name: M:Sander.SequentialGuid.GuidHelper.GetByteAt(System.Guid,System.Int32)
member.summary:
Get byte from GUID without converting GUID to byte array
This is very slightly faster than using Guid.ToByteArray(), but uses far less memory

member.name: M:Sander.SequentialGuid.SequentialGuid.#ctor
member.summary: Creates a sequential GUID based on random GUID

member.name: M:Sander.SequentialGuid.SequentialGuid.#ctor(System.Guid)
member.summary: Create sequential GUID from existing GUID

member.name: M:Sander.SequentialGuid.SequentialGuid.Next
member.summary: Return next sequential value of GUID
